name: PrimaryOpen-AngleGlaucoma
title: Primary Open-Angle Glaucoma
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of primary open-angle glaucoma (POAG).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of primary open-angle glaucoma (POAG) and open-angle glaucoma.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to 'unspecified eye.')
